verses.verse: "You shall not spread <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report. <S%H8088><s%> Don't <S%H7896><s%> join your hand <S%H3027><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to be a malicious <S%H2555><s%> witness. <S%H5707><s%>

"You shall not follow <S%H310><s%> a crowd <S%H7227><s%> to do evil; <S%H7451><s%> neither shall you testify <S%H6030><s%> in court <S%H7379><s%> to side <S%H5186><s%> with <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> to pervert justice; <S%H5186><s%>
neither shall you favor <S%H1921><s%> a poor <S%H1800><s%> man in his cause. <S%H7379><s%>

"If you meet <S%H6293><s%> your enemy <S%H341><s%>'s ox <S%H7794><s%> or his donkey <S%H2543><s%> going astray, <S%H8582><s%> you shall surely <S%H7725><s%> bring it back <S%H7725><s%> to him again. <S%H7725><s%>

If you see <S%H7200><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> of him who hates <S%H8130><s%> you fallen down <S%H7257><s%> under his burden, <S%H4853><s%> don't <S%H2308><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> him, <S%H5800><s%> you shall surely help him with it. <S%H5800><s%>
"You shall not deny <S%H5186><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> to your poor <S%H34><s%> people in their lawsuits. <S%H7379><s%>

"Keep far <S%H7368><s%> from a false <S%H8267><s%> charge, <S%H1697><s%> and don't <S%H2026><s%> kill the innocent <S%H5355><s%> and righteous: <S%H6662><s%> for I will not justify <S%H6663><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> no bribe, <S%H7810><s%> for a bribe <S%H7810><s%> blinds <S%H5786><s%> those who have sight <S%H6493><s%> and perverts <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

"You shall not oppress <S%H3905><s%> an alien, <S%H1616><s%> for you know <S%H3045><s%> the heart <S%H5315><s%> of an alien, <S%H1616><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you were aliens <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"For six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your land, <S%H776><s%> and shall gather <S%H622><s%> in its increase, <S%H8393><s%>

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year you shall let it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie <S%H5203><s%> fallow, <S%H34><s%> that the poor of your people <S%H5971><s%> may eat; <S%H398><s%> and what they leave <S%H3499><s%> the animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat. <S%H398><s%> In the same way, <S%H6213><s%> you shall deal with your vineyard <S%H3754><s%> and with your olive grove. <S%H2132><s%>

"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> your work, <S%H4639><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest, <S%H7673><s%> that your ox <S%H7794><s%> and your donkey <S%H2543><s%> may have rest, <S%H5117><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid, <S%H519><s%> and the alien <S%H1616><s%> may be refreshed. <S%H5314><s%>

"Be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do all things that I have said <S%H559><s%> to you; <S%H2142><s%> and don't invoke the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> neither let them be heard <S%H8085><s%> out <S%H5921><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"You shall observe a feast <S%H2287><s%> to me three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> a year. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%> Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H4150><s%> at the time appointed in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%> (for in it you came out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>), and no one shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty. <S%H7387><s%>

And the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest, <S%H7105><s%> the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your labors, <S%H4639><s%> which you sow <S%H2232><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest, <S%H614><s%> at the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year, <S%H8141><s%> when you gather <S%H622><s%> in your labors <S%H4639><s%> out of the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> all your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"You shall not offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened bread, <S%H2557><s%> neither shall the fat <S%H2459><s%> of my feast <S%H2282><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> all night until the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> "You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a young goat <S%H1423><s%> in its mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk. <S%H2461><s%>

"Behold, <S%H7971><s%> I send an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H8104><s%> to keep you by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> you into the place <S%H4725><s%> which I have prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

Pay attention <S%H8104><s%> to <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H8085><s%> and listen to his voice. <S%H6963><s%> Don't <S%H4843><s%> provoke him, <S%H5375><s%> for he will not pardon your disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%> is in him. <S%H7130><s%>

But if you indeed <S%H8085><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all that I speak, <S%H1696><s%> then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> to your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and an adversary <S%H6887><s%> to your adversaries. <S%H6696><s%>

For my angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H935><s%> and bring you in to the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite; <S%H2983><s%> and I will cut them off. <S%H3582><s%>

You shall not bow down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor serve <S%H5647><s%> them, <S%H6213><s%> nor follow their practices, <S%H4639><s%> but you shall utterly <S%H2040><s%> overthrow <S%H2040><s%> them and <S%H7665><s%> demolish <S%H7665><s%> their pillars. <S%H4676><s%>

You shall serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and he will bless <S%H1288><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> and your water, <S%H4325><s%> and I will take <S%H5493><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from your midst. <S%H7130><s%>
No one will miscarry <S%H7921><s%> or be barren <S%H6135><s%> in your land. <S%H776><s%> I will fulfill <S%H4390><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days. <S%H3117><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> my terror <S%H367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H2000><s%> and will confuse all the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom you come, <S%H935><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs to you. <S%H6203><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H1644><s%> which will drive out the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> from before you. <S%H6440><s%>

I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you in one <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> lest the land <S%H776><s%> become desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> multiply against you. <S%H7227><s%>
Little <S%H4592><s%> by little <S%H4592><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H6509><s%> until you have increased and inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

I will set <S%H7896><s%> your border <S%H1366><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the River; <S%H5104><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and you shall drive them out <S%H1644><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>
You shall make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, <S%H430><s%> nor with their gods.

They shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> lest they make you sin <S%H2398><s%> against me, <S%H5647><s%> for if you serve their gods, <S%H430><s%> it will surely be a snare to you. <S%H4170><s%>"
